comments:
Build 20020125

I created a fragment.xml in a Fragment Project that causes a 
NullPointerException in the PDE manifest builder.  The fragment file contents 
and stack trace are below.

fragment.xml contents:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!-- File written by PDE 1.0 -->
<fragment
   id="TestFrag"
   name="TestFrag"
   plugin-id=""
   plugin-version="">
<runtime>
   <library name="TestFrag.jar"/>
</runtime>
</fragment>

Stack trace:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.PDEPlugin.findPlugin(PDEPlugin.java:113)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.PDEPlugin.findPlugin(PDEPlugin.java:125)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.builders.ManifestConsistencyChecker.validateFragment(Ma
nifestConsistencyChecker.java:146)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.builders.ManifestConsistencyChecker.checkFile(ManifestC
onsistencyChecker.java:99)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.builders.ManifestConsistencyChecker.access$1(ManifestCo
nsistencyChecker.java:88)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.builders.ManifestConsistencyChecker$DeltaVisitor.visit(
ManifestConsistencyChecker.java:49)
	at 
org.eclipse.core.internal.events.ResourceDelta.accept(ResourceDelta.java(Compile
d Code))
	at 
org.eclipse.core.internal.events.ResourceDelta.accept(ResourceDelta.java(Compile
d Code))
	at 
org.eclipse.core.internal.events.ResourceDelta.accept(ResourceDelta.java:43)
	at 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.builders.ManifestConsistencyChecker.build(ManifestConsi
stencyChecker.java:84)
	at 
org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager$2.run(BuildManager.java:358)
... etc ...

I realized that these builders are provided by the PDE "ui" plugin.  Changing 
component.

I tested the provided manifest file with 20020205 integration build and this 
NPE does not happen any more. In addition, in the next integration build the 
builder will report correct line numbers.
